author: jgm
content:
```
curl -s http://localhost:5052/eth/v1/beacon/states/head/validators | jq '.data[].validator.withdrawal_credentials[2:4]' | sort | uniq -c
```

author: potuz

author: jgm
content: Yeah, `uniq -c` only counts contiguous entries that are the same.
